Action.Description: Save your own clone's ID in variable cloneID
Fate Calibration Header (Move me!) | Toggle to enable/disable images
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection α
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection β
Sort clonelist after list has been made
Fire Clone TTS Trigger if variables are sufficient
Fire Clone Image Trigger if variables are sufficient
Unset obsolete scalar variables at Fate Calibration cast finish
Unset clonelist at Fate Calibration cast finish
Deactivate images at real Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament

Trigger.Name: Walking Dead
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>(?<name>[\w']+)[\w ']+) gains the effect of Walking Dead

Trigger.Name: Countdown
Trigger.RegularExpression: (Battle commencing in (?<countdown>.*) seconds!|戦闘開始まで(?<countdown>.*)秒！)
